dress_designs.silhouette: Defined waist A-line to create curves on a rectangle frame
dress_designs.neckline: V-neck to elongate the neck and complement the oval face
dress_designs.sleeves: Short flutter sleeves for a light, spring feel
dress_designs.fabric: Silk chiffon with a lightweight crepe lining
dress_designs.pattern_details: Subtle white floral embroidery on a deep blue base
dress_designs.fit: Structured bodice with a self-tie belt to define the waistline
dress_designs.image_generation_prompt: High-fashion studio photography of a medium-toned woman with an oval face wearing an elegant midi-length A-line wedding guest dress. The dress features a deep navy blue (#3b5998) silk chiffon fabric adorned with delicate white floral embroidery. It has a flattering V-neckline, short flutter sleeves, and a structured waist defined by a matching fabric belt to enhance a rectangular silhouette. The skirt flows softly to mid-calf. Lighting is soft, warm spring sunshine coming from the side, highlighting the fabric's texture. Background is a minimalist cream-toned architectural space. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, professional fashion editorial style.

dress_designs.silhouette: Wrap style to create diagonal lines and visual waist definition
dress_designs.neckline: Surplice neckline to frame the oval face shape beautifully
dress_designs.sleeves: Three-quarter length bishop sleeves with buttoned cuffs
dress_designs.fabric: Mid-weight satin with a soft sheen
dress_designs.pattern_details: Solid warm saddle brown with cream piping along the edges
dress_designs.fit: Adjustable wrap fit that adds volume to the hips and bust
dress_designs.image_generation_prompt: Professional fashion photography of an elegant woman with warm-undertone medium skin in a rich saddle brown (#8b4513) satin wrap maxi dress. The dress features long bishop sleeves and a surplice neckline that complements her oval face. The wrap design creates an hourglass illusion on her rectangular body shape. The fabric has a luxurious, subtle sheen. Shot in a lush spring garden at golden hour, soft bokeh background of blooming white flowers. Detailed textures of the satin and precise stitching. High-end magazine aesthetic.

dress_designs.silhouette: Tiered skirt to add volume to the lower body, balancing the rectangle shape
dress_designs.neckline: Boat neckline to broaden shoulders slightly and flatter the oval face
dress_designs.pattern_details: White lace with small navy blue beaded accents
dress_designs.fit: Fitted bodice with a voluminous tiered skirt starting from the natural waist
dress_designs.image_generation_prompt: Detailed image of a sophisticated white organza tea-length dress for a wedding guest. The dress features a boat neckline and a fitted bodice that transitions into a voluminous tiered skirt, perfect for adding shape to a rectangular frame. Intricate navy blue (#3b5998) beading is scattered across the white lace overlay. The woman has a medium skin tone with warm undertones and an oval face. The setting is an upscale outdoor spring wedding with soft-focus floral arrangements. Studio-quality lighting, sharp focus on lace texture, vibrant yet elegant color palette.
